mapper.update:
update t_individual_achievement

achievement = #{achievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reward = #{reward,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_individual_achievement set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, achievement = #{achievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reward = #{reward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reward_time = #{rewardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
